title: Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu - Count, Letters & Link (3in1) | Math, Words, Magnetic Blocks, Puzzles | 4-10 Years STEM Toys | Gift Boys & Girls (Works with iPads, iPhones, Samsung tabs, Kindle Fire)
descriptions:
Introducing the PlayShifu Plugo STEM Pack, a 3-in-1 educational toy that combines the power of three popular STEM kits - Plugo Count, Plugo Letters, and Plugo Link. With interactive games and story-based challenges, this pack is perfect for boys and girls aged 4-10. Watch the video to see it in action!

The Plugo app offers 15 games and over 750 levels, ensuring hours of engaging and educational fun with no in-app purchases. The app adapts to the child's grade level, making it suitable for a progressive learning journey from pre-K to Grade 4.

Not just your average toys, the Plugo 3-in-1 pack enhances counting, arithmetic, linguistic, comprehension, problem-solving, and fine-motor skills. It sparks STEAM skills, especially in math, engineering, and language development.

The pack includes three Plugo kits (Count, Link, and Letters) and one Plugo Gamepad. The gamepad is a foldable mat that securely holds your device, while the play area with embedded magnets allows for hands-on interaction with the Plugo kits. Download the free Plugo app from the App Store or Play Store to get started (tablet/smartphone not included).

Compatible with a wide range of devices, including iPhones, iPads, Samsung tablets, and Kindle Fire. For a complete list of compatible devices, please refer to the compatibility dashboard on the official PlayShifu website. Don't miss out on this ultimate STEM learning experience for your child!

Introducing the PlayShifu Plugo STEM Pack - a 3-in-1 educational toy that combines the power of three beloved AR-powered STEM kits. With Plugo Count, Letters, and Link, children can learn math, spelling, vocabulary, and problem-solving skills through hands-on play. This STEM pack is perfect for boys and girls aged 4-10 and comes with 15 interactive games and over 750 levels, ensuring a progressive educational journey. The Plugo app adapts to each child's grade level, making learning fun and personalized. The pack includes three Plugo kits and one gamepad, creating an immersive and engaging learning experience. Compatible with a wide range of devices, including iPads, iPhones, Samsung tabs, and Kindle Fire, the Plugo STEM Pack offers a perfect balance between screen-time and hands-on learning. Spark STEAM skills and ignite a love for learning with the PlayShifu Plugo STEM Pack.

Introducing the Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu - Count, Letters & Link (3in1)! This amazing combo brings together three beloved AR-powered STEM kits that will provide hours of educational fun for kids ages 4-10. With Plugo Count, they'll learn math; with Plugo Letters, they'll build vocabulary and spelling skills; and with Plugo Link, they'll solve puzzles using magnetic blocks. These hands-on learning experiences are perfect for both boys and girls, and the story-based challenges ensure a healthy balance of screen-time. 

The Plugo app features 15 interactive games and over 750 levels, offering a progressive educational journey tailored to your child's grade level from pre-K to Grade 4. No in-app purchases necessary! These STEM toys go beyond the basics, sharpening counting, arithmetic, linguistic, comprehension, problem-solving, and fine-motor skills. They're designed to spark STEAM skills, especially in math, engineering, and language abilities. 

In the box, you'll find the three Plugo kits (Count, Link, and Letters) along with the Plugo Gamepad. The Gamepad is a foldable mat that securely holds your device while providing a play area with embedded magnets for the Plugo kits. To get started, simply download the free Plugo app from the App Store or Play Store (please note that the box does not include a tablet/smartphone).

The Plugo STEM Pack is compatible with a wide range of devices. For iOS users, it works with iPhone 6 and above, as well as iPad 5th Gen and above (excluding iPad Mini 1 and iPad Pro 12.9"). Android users need OS 8 and above, with 2GB RAM and above (smartphones require a front camera at the top center, and 10" screen tablets and above are not supported). Amazon Fire users can enjoy the Plugo experience with Fire 7 (2022), Fire 8 (2018 and 2020), and Fire 8+ (2020). For a complete list of compatible devices, please refer to the compatibility dashboard on the official PlayShifu website.

Don't miss out on this comprehensive STEM toy combo that guarantees both fun and learning! Watch the video to see the Plugo STEM Pack in action and grab yours today. Perfect as a gift for boys and girls alike!

generation_prompt_text:
Write an advertising description for the following product. Use the existing description below as a guideline, matching it roughly in quality and level of detail. Do not include information not available in the description below. Do not directly plagiarize the description below. Be concise and informative. Assume potential buyers who read the ad have access to a photo of the product, and are scanning through many different similar advertisements, spending little time on each, and that they value being able to quickly see the most important details.

---

Title: Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu - Count, Letters & Link (3in1) | Math, Words, Magnetic Blocks, Puzzles | 4-10 Years STEM Toys | Gift Boys & Girls (Works with iPads, iPhones, Samsung tabs, Kindle Fire)

Description: Pu

PlayShifu PLUGO 3-IN-1 STEM PACK combines the goodness of three of our very loved kids' toys, the AR-powered STEM kits - Plugo Count to learn math, Plugo Letters to spell and build vocabulary, and Plugo Link to solve puzzles with magnetic blocks. Hands-on learning and healthy screen-time guaranteed with story-based challenges, making it the perfect gifts for boys and girls alike. Watch the video to catch them all in action!

AGES 4-10 - One of our most extensive STEM toys combo, the Plugo app has 15 interactive games and 750+ levels that make learning super fun (no in-app purchases). More importantly, the app adapts these games to the child’s grade from pre-K to Grade 4 for a progressive educational journey

STEAM & everything in between - Not your regular toys for girls and boys, these will sharpen your counting, arithmetic, linguistic, comprehension, problem-solving, and fine-motor skills. The Plugo 3-in-1 pack consists of our range of STEM toys for kids 4 or 5 years of age and above. It works to spark STEAM skills, especially math, engineering and linguistic abilities

IN THE BOX - The pack contains 3 Plugo kits (Count, Link, and Letters) and 1 Plugo Gamepad. The gamepad is a foldable mat that holds your device goes in the slot on one side. It has a play area on the other side with embedded magnets to place and play with the Plugo kits one-by-one. Download the Plugo app from App Store or Play Store for free and get started (The box doesn’t come with a tablet/smartphone)

COMPATIBILE DEVICES: iOS - iPhone 6 & above, iPad 5th Gen & above (Note: iPad Mini 1 & iPad Pro 12.9” are not supported) | Android: OS 8 & above, 2GB RAM & above, (Note: For smartphones, it is mandatory to have a front camera at the top centre; 10"" screen tablets & above are not supported) | Amazon Fire: 7 - 2022, 8 - 2018 & 2020, 8+ - 2020. Check the compatibility dashboard on the official PlayShifu website for the full list of compatible devices
